title: Lucid Dreaming - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/16/20
itunes:title: Lucid Dreaming - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/16/20
description:
George Noory and author Ian Jaydid explore his research into lucid dreaming, where you are aware you are in a dream and can control its outcome, as well as his experiences with astral projection, with his spirit leaving his physical body to explore the universe.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
